Cl2-CX-Portal.name: view_user_management
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: Users with this right can access the user management in CX

Cl2-CX-Portal.name: delete_apps
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: User with this role can delete apps published in the Marketplace

Cl2-CX-Portal.name: view_client_roles
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: Users with this right can view the client roles of an app

Cl2-CX-Portal.name: view_user_account
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: Users with this role can view the user account of others

Cl2-CX-Portal.name: edit_apps
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: Users with this role can edit apps which are published in the marketplace

Cl2-CX-Portal.name: view_submitted_applications
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: Users with this right can view submitted applications and the respective application status

Cl2-CX-Portal.name: view_technical_setup
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: Users with this right can setup EDC /IDP/etc.

Cl2-CX-Portal.name: view_use_cases
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: Users can view available use cases in the network

Cl2-CX-Portal.name: modify_user_account
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: Users with this right can modify users related to their company

Cl2-CX-Portal.name: view_app_subscription
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: view app subscriptions in pending, active and inactive

Cl2-CX-Portal.name: view_service_subscriptions
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: User is able to view service subscription under own service

Cl2-CX-Portal.name: add_apps
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: Users with this role can publish new apps in the Marketplace

Cl2-CX-Portal.name: approve_new_partner
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: User with this right can let new partners access the portal by approving the company registration request inside the admin board

Cl2-CX-Portal.name: subscribe_apps
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: User is able to start the app subscription process

Cl2-CX-Portal.name: approve_app_release
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: User can approve apps to get released on the marketplace

Cl2-CX-Portal.name: decline_new_partner
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: User can decline a partner application

Cl2-CX-Portal.name: add_tech_user_management
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: Create / request technical users for my org

Cl2-CX-Portal.name: add_user_account
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: Users with this right can add user accounts under their CX company

Cl2-CX-Portal.name: create_ssi_notifications
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: User can create notifications for ssi credentials

Cl2-CX-Portal.name: add_idp
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: User can create a new idp under his organisation

Cl2-CX-Portal.name: view_connectors
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: Look up company connectors and their details

Cl2-CX-Portal.name: view_apps
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: Users with this role can view apps in the App Marketplace

Cl2-CX-Portal.name: decline_app_release
Cl2-CX-Portal.description: User can decline apps to not get released on the marketplace

Cl25-CX-BPDM-Orchestrator.name: create_reservation_clean
Cl25-CX-BPDM-Orchestrator.description: Allowed to create reservations for golden record tasks inside the 'Clean' queue.

Cl25-CX-BPDM-Orchestrator.name: create_result_clean
Cl25-CX-BPDM-Orchestrator.description: Allowed to create results for reserved golden record tasks in the 'Clean' queue.

Cl25-CX-BPDM-Orchestrator.description: Allowed to create results for reserved golden record tasks in the 'PoolSync' queue.

Cl25-CX-BPDM-Orchestrator.name: read_task
Cl25-CX-BPDM-Orchestrator.description: Allowed to read the processing state and result of golden record tasks.

Cl25-CX-BPDM-Orchestrator.name: create_reservation_cleanAndSync
Cl25-CX-BPDM-Orchestrator.description: Allowed to create reservations for golden record tasks in the 'CleanAndSync' queue

Cl25-CX-BPDM-Orchestrator.name: create_reservation_poolSync
Cl25-CX-BPDM-Orchestrator.description: Allowed to create reservations for golden record tasks in the 'PoolSync' queue.

Cl25-CX-BPDM-Orchestrator.name: create_result_cleanAndSync
Cl25-CX-BPDM-Orchestrator.description: Allowed to create results for reserved golden record tasks in the 'CleanAndSync' queue.

Cl25-CX-BPDM-Orchestrator.name: create_task
Cl25-CX-BPDM-Orchestrator.description: Allowed to create new golden record tasks

technical_roles_management.description: Allowed to process golden record tasks in the 'PoolSync' queue

technical_roles_management.name: BPDM Orchestrator Admin
technical_roles_management.description: Full read and write access to the BPDM Orchestrator component

technical_roles_management.description: Allowed to process golden record tasks in the 'CleanAndSync' queue

technical_roles_management.description: Allowed to create new golden record tasks, monitor the processing state and result.

Cl1-CX-Registration.description: User is able to add / edit company data under the registration process

Cl1-CX-Registration.description: User is able to submit the registration to Catena-X

Cl1-CX-Registration.description: User is able to upload documents in the registration service

Cl1-CX-Registration.description: Permission to access & view the registration process

Cl1-CX-Registration.name: invite_user

Cl1-CX-Registration.description: User is able to confirm Terms & Conditions

Technical User SSI Credential Issuer - Portal to SSI Credential Issuer (portal helm chart: backend.processesworker.issuerComponent.clientId)

clients.name: Technical User CX internal - communication GitHub and Semantic Hub

Technical User for Portal to SD (portal helm chart: backend.processesworker.sdfactory.clientId)
